data.name: Western Province
data.detailed_description:
Fight for or Against the Law
Sometimes justice ain’t as simple as right or wrong. The reputation system reflects your character’s choices and what kind of person you really are.
- Pickpocket, murder, and steal your way to wealth.
- Fight for the law and claim the big bounties by rustlin’ outlaws.
- Ride the grey line between good and evil.
- Take the passive course and be a humble citizen.

Build the New Frontier
Construct your own homestead with Western Province’s dynamic building system. Build and decorate your estate with a large range of objects.
Towns are always active and relevant in the vast world. Offline players have their buildings removed and stored for their next session.

Build a Trade Empire
Pick up a profession and build your business to earn your coin. Choose from a variety of professions from gunsmithing to farming, the Province yearns for a new empire to grow. Throughout our early access development, we’ll be bringing more professions to the frontier!

Customise
Barbers, tailors, and salesmen will keep you outfitted for all your adventures. Browse through the 123 different cosmetic items with a possible combination of 65,000+ outfits to find the right look for you.

data.short_description: Western Province is a wild west-themed massively multiplayer sandbox game, with a focus on flexible play-styles and player interaction. Build a business empire, join a criminal gang, or form a law posse!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 64-bit Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHZ CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
